actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The deathspitter makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spit Poison
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one creature. The target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8 damage) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In addition, a creature that fails its saving throw is {@condition blinded} until the end of the deathspitter's next turn.
